title: Verify Application Loads Main Landing Page Successfully

steps.action: Navigate to the application URL: https://dev-amber.dev.clippd.com/
steps.expected: The application page loads without any HTTP errors (e.g., 404, 500) and no critical browser console errors are displayed.

steps.action: Observe the displayed content on the page.
steps.expected: The main landing page, login screen, or dashboard of the 'Clippd' application is clearly visible and presents its primary UI elements.

verification: Presence of the application's primary header/navigation, a visible title like 'Clippd' or 'Amber', a login form, or dashboard overview content, indicating the application has initialized and rendered successfully.
